1.25.21  11:55 pm   hi bill, could you please give me a random note to start my song on? i've never really written a song before but i've been playing music (mostly classical) for almost my entire life and i thought it might be neat to spice things up by composing something myself. problem is, i really don't know where to start, but if you gave me a note or even a random word that would probably give me enough motivation to at least get started. thanks
